ygData.subject: Re: oops..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The quest giver is a neutral faction, but it is convenient to have good faction to get to him.  You do not need MM faction, however. Xilith
ygData.messageBody:
"Wilson, ThomasX B" wrote:
>
> From: "Wilson, ThomasX B" <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
>
> Well for the first time in months MM was actually camped heavily last night
> on my server so I never got to talk to the guy.. I saw him once, right
> before several high lvl casters decided to make an example of him.. I'm
> hoping I can get on late tonight and have no one else around..
>
> On the faction side, I also stopped in High Keep looking for Leyna(sp?), not
> to be found.. And I realized that it takes a hell of a lot of bards to get
> your faction increased. (That plus their are on a 20min respawn makes it
> annoying as hell). Now the million dollar question, do you actually need MM
> faction to do the quest, plus I've heard rumors that there are only 4 SK
> armor pieces (compared to 7 for the other classes) can anybody confirm this?
>

The quest giver is a neutral faction, but it is convenient to have
good faction to get to him. You do not need MM faction, however.

Xilith
